name: Playback (Wobfog)
description:
Overview:

This is a game created for the 2020 Brackey's Game Jam with the theme "Rewind". In this game, you are a robot which can record it's actions and rewind time to play them back in order to solve puzzles.

Controls: Move Left"A"Move Right"D"Jump"Space"Record ActionsHold "Right Mouse"Playback Actions"Left Mouse"Pause"Esc"
